format: html

```{r}
library(dplyr)
library(tidyr)
library(readr)
library(rvest)
```

```{r}
url <- "https://www.hockey-reference.com/boxscores/202210180NSH.html#scoring"
h <- read_html(url)
tab <- h %>% html_nodes("table")
```

```{r}
test <- tab %>% html_table()

head( test[[1]] )
head( test[[2]] )
```

```{r}
scoring <- test[[1]]
la <- test[[3]]
nashville <- test[[5]]
```

```{r}
( la <- la[-c(1), ] )
( colnames(la)<- c("Rank", "Player", "G", "A", "PTS", "p_m", "EV_goals", 
                   "PP_goals", "SH_goals", "GW_goals", "EV_assists",
                   "PP_assists", "SH_assists", "huh", "S", "S_percent", "Shifts",
                   "TOI") )
```


```{r}
shootout <- nhl_schedule %>%
  rename(V_goals = "G...3",
         H_goals = "G...5",
         extra_time = "...6",
         attendance = "Att.") %>%
  filter(extra_time == "SO") %>%
  select(c(1:7))
```
